channel.title: Removed thread per client - cant log in
channel.description:
Well I didn'tget any compile errors while removing thread per client. But now, when i click run, it doesnt say Null Pointer exception anymore.
What it does is this:
[code]ClientHandler: Accepted from 192.168.1.1:3833[/code]
It says its accepted but the client does not load the game. So, you dont log in. Any help?

he gets kicks outa it… thinks it makes me mad but watever hes just being gay

silabgarza:

chassy tell me if u get it? friken mike (owner of ploxagescape) keeps null’ing me, i have anti null and all but it still crashes the login handling stuff, so i was hoping this wuld help so it wuldn’t have an effect XD

Why does he keep null’ing you?
